result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Seth J Peterson

records.addlTxt: Court appoints Attorney Aaron Vruwink. Orders payments of $75 per month
records.descr: Pet for appointment counsel,affidavit of indigency

records.addlTxt:
10:19 AM Defendant Seth J Peterson in court.  Prosecuting attorney Craig Lambert in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant is not eligible for a PD attorney. Court appoints Attorney Aaron Vruwink and orders payments of $75 per month.
Arraignment scheduled for November 21, 2022 at 10:00 am.

9:03 AM Defendant Seth J Peterson in court.  Prosecuting attorney Rose Marie Yanke in court for the State of Wisconsin. Court questions regarding non-representation.  Court will proceed with the option of having the matter reheard.  Officer Terry Endries is sworn and questioned by Attorney Yanke.  Testifies to training and experience.  Testifies that on June 4, 2022 he was dispatched to the Old Dutch Inn regarding a complaint of an odor of marijuana.  Witness identifies the defendant in the courtroom.  Testifies that defendant was in the apartment with another person. Testifies to searching the apartment and testifies to the items found.  Testifies that the items were tested.  Court takes judicial notice of case no. 21CF652. 

Court finds probable cause to believe that a felony was committed and that the defendant committed it. Bond is continued.
Arraignment scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing and Arraignment on October 11, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Text Message Reminder of Court Date Agreement

ADDRESS INFO for Seth J Peterson
Current: PO Box 95, Granton, WI 54436 United States  (Effective: 10-05-2022)
Prior: 908 N Central Ave #1, Marshfield, WI 54449
No contact with co-defendant, AJ Rueth. No controlled substances without a valid prescription.

1:48 PM Defendant Seth J Peterson in court.  Attorney Austin Mogard in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Transferred to Branch 1 for preliminary hearing.

9:36 AM Defendant Seth J Peterson not in court.  Prosecuting attorney Jennifer C Zima in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
State requests warrant.
Court orders warrant. No bond.
